thread.title: Birthday weekend treat to see Phantom of the opera.
thread.title_full: Birthday weekend treat to see Phantom of the opera. - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Paul W
title: Birthday weekend treat to see Phantom of the opera.
text:
Big thanks to Point a hotel at Canary Wharf. A lovely warm welcome was had by Nurun and Canan on reception. Very helpful in giving us directions to the nearby tube station at Canary Wharf.
The rooms were compact and clean, with everything needed for a good nights kip.
Thanks also for the Facebook link which contained a gift of a late checkout worth Â£10.
I plan to visit London later this year and will definitely choose Point a hotel again.
Lovely location, lovely staff, what more could you want x
Paul Walker
